Articles.Content:
**Su-27 Flanker** *and* **Su-37 Terminator**

Hello! Sorry for the confusion, as I already posted a thread about my flanker, but I decided to make it stock, so now no mods are required for this version!

**Su-27**

[Download](https://www.dropbox.com/s/rr2r3wy905nhikr/Su-27s%20Flanker.craft?dl=0)

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/LBqFv)

**Su-37**

[Download](https://www.dropbox.com/s/pja0nl6agfppw6n/Su-37%20Terminator.craft?dl=0)

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/6Nfuy)

**Modded versions (uses** [**BDArmory**](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/90/BahamutoDs%20Armory) **and** [**BD Dynamics**](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/101/Bahamuto_Dynamics_Parts_pack_v1.1)**)**

Su-27 Air Defense Role (Air-to-Air)

[Download](https://www.dropbox.com/s/3a4fyd8c6g49jqj/Su-27s%20Flanker%28A-A%29.craft?dl=0)

Su-37 Weapons demo craft (Air-to-Air)

[Download](https://www.dropbox.com/s/n2tphudo54e9y8k/Su-37%20Terminator%20%28A-A%29.craft?dl=0)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-28T06:03:07Z" title="08/28/2015 06:03  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 28, 2015</time> by Yaeah**
New versions uploaded with better aesthetics and performance
That's pretty rad! Can it pull a cobra like the real thing?

> 
> That's pretty rad! Can it pull a cobra like the real thing?

Yeah, but its a lot easier to pull in the Su-37, in fact it's almost hard not to at some points!

For the Flanker, Youd have to be at higher altitude and flying around ~300+m

Another tip: change the gimbal limit for whiplash engines in their .cfg files, from 1 degree to 5-7 degrees for more post stall maneuvering control
